name: Learn: Space
description:
With Learn: Space your kid will be able to learn about the space, spelling, and pronunciation. 

Includes two modes:

1. Learn

   -Touch the space picture or spelling to hear the pronunciation.

2. Play

   -Learn while having fun. Create your own space scene by moving the different objects around.

3. Challenge

   -Different challenge types. (Can be configured in settings)

   -Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.

   -Challenge types:

      -Match Word - Match the part of the body image with the corresponding word spelling.

      -Match Image - Hear and see the word spelling, and match with the correct part of the body image.

   -Space objects to match can be configured in settings

*Objects theme (cartoon or real) can be configured in settings.

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
